attributes.action: Build more football facilities 4G Pitches artificial grass for young children
attributes.additional_details: To work together with the Premier league and lower leagues to get funding to build more facilities for grassroots football 4G Pitches astro turf
attributes.background: build more facilities 4G pitches because of the winters in this country. so we Need more training facilities and match facilities,  so it will stop so many children and older at grassroots level games being disappointed in the winter months which affects all children's health and mental health

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about building 4G football pitches are a matter for individual leisure centres and local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to provide additional funding for the construction of 4G football pitches, if that's something you'd like to happen.
